explains: n. 葫芦，葫芦科植物；（用作盛水容器的）瓢；脑瓜
wordGroup: bitter gourd 苦瓜，苦味葫芦
bottle gourd 葫芦；瓢葫芦；葫芦瓜

sentences.en: Mom and I took off the towel gourd with the joy of harvest.
sentences.cn: 我和妈妈带着丰收的喜悦摘下了丝瓜。

sentences.en: It is "chicken and wax gourd curry" or "gaeng khua fak gub gai" in Thai.
sentences.cn: 这是“冬瓜鸡咖喱”，或者用泰语讲是“gaeng khua fak gub gai”。

sentences.en: Transfer to a deeper pot, and add another cup of coconut milk together with the wax gourd.
sentences.cn: 移至较深的锅中，加入另一杯椰奶和冬瓜。
